biotools.summary: Tool for the discovery of synergistic pairs of SNPs from large genome-wide case-control association studies data on complex diseases. The web server receives GWAS data submissions, invokes the interaction analysis and returns results. The user can explore details on identified SNP-SNP pairs, perform gene set enrichment analysis and interact with the constructed SNP synergy network.
